---------------------------
Scan Arc Type | (3002,012E)
---------------------------
:Action: Remove (X)
:Justication: [AUTO] Attribute-Module type
:Basic Profile: N/A
:In Modules:
   - ct-image [Mandatory (M)] [Optional (3)]::

       <p>
        Categorization of the amount of rotation of the scan.
       </p>
       <div>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Enumerated Values:
         </strong>
        </p>
        <dl>
         <dt>
          <span>
           FULL_ARC
          </span>
         </dt>
         <dd>
          <p>
           360 deg
          </p>
         </dd>
         <dt>
          <span>
           HALF_ARC
          </span>
         </dt>
         <dd>
          <p>
           180 deg
          </p>
         </dd>
         <dt>
          <span>
           CUSTOM_ARC
          </span>
         </dt>
         <dd>
          <p>
           user defined scan range
          </p>
         </dd>
        </dl>
       </div>
